page.description: Return a list of databases from the current server.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::ListDatabases() Syntax Database_List as C = &ltSQL::Connection>.ListDatabases() ArgumentDescription Database_ListA list of the databases. &ltSQL::Connection>A SQL::Connection object.
Description The ListDatabases() method returns a list of databases on the current server. Limitations Example dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API=MySQL, Server='server',Port='port', UserName='username', Password='password'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if ui_msg_box("Databases", conn.ListDatabases()) conn.close()
See Also SQL::Connection Object
